short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically closes empty or about:blank tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Close Blank Tabs Extension is a browser extension that automatically closes empty or about
tabs, helping you keep your browser organized and free from distractions. It features customizable check intervals, multi-language support (English and Spanish), and displays the remaining time until the next tab close.
